channel.title: CVE Feed for workos -- authkit-nextjs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for workos -- authkit-nextjs

item.title: CVE-2024-29901|2024-03-29T15:23:02.184Z -- workos -- authkit-nextjs
item.description: The AuthKit library for Next.js provides helpers for authentication and session management using WorkOS & AuthKit with Next.js. A user can reuse an expired session by controlling the `x-workos-session` header. The vulnerability is patched in v0.4.2.
